title: [BUG] Latest preview nuget package no longer works with WinUI when updating to ProjectReunion 0.8
body:
**Description**

Microsoft changed the namespace of the dispatcher queue. And now creating a ` SKXamlCanvas` throw this exception:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57390463/124140514-d510fd80-da88-11eb-9556-0ea05a4ff99e.png)

**Code**
```csharp
public class MyControl : SKXamlCanvas
{
}
```

**Basic Information**
- Version with issue:  2.88.0-preview.46
